section.title: Introduction
section.p: DML is general purpose XML schema particulary well suited to books, articles and annotations in other XML sources.
DML is normatively available as a RELAX NG schema with additional Schematron assertions to cover all cases.
The DML namespace has the URI http://purl.oclc.org/NET/dml/1.0/. Usually it is used associated with dml prefix.
The metadata model use a set of metadata attributes which are extensively defined in RDFa Syntax from W3C.
